author: harishp
msg: 1. Changed -start/-stop options of tomcat.sh to start/stop.
2. Modified a few scripts that take command line arguments to use $@
instead of $*. ($* messes if commandline arg has " ")
3. Enhanced the performance of NetworkClassLoader.

author: craigmcc
msg: Reinstate ServletContext.log(String msg) writing to System.err so that
these messages do not get silently swallowed.
A pluggable logging solution is really needed here.
